annotations.title: Easy Low Proof Classic Cocktails! | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Sherry
1.5 oz. -or- 45ml. Dry Vermouth
Two Dashes Angostura Bitters
Two Dashes Orange Bitters
Barspoon of Simple Syrup

Stir over ice
serve up
garnish with orange twist
